testimonials.name: Grace Liu
testimonials.text: Hey! Just wanted to message you and say THANK YOU for recommending this sweater. I was hesitant because I've been burned by "cashmere" before that was basically polyester, but this is the real deal. The red color is absolutely stunning - I wore it to a holiday party and felt so confident. It's warm but not too hot, and the fit is perfect (I got a medium, I'm usually a size 8). Definitely buying another color. Worth every penny! ‚ù§Ô∏è

testimonials.name: Hannah Brooks
testimonials.text: Okay so I need to tell you about this sweater... I ordered it on a whim during the pre-order and honestly didn't expect much. But when it arrived I literally gasped. The quality is INCREDIBLE. I compared it to my $200 cashmere sweater from Nordstrom and I genuinely can't tell the difference. The red is so rich and elegant, not cheap-looking at all. I've washed it twice (hand wash, cold water) and it still looks brand new. This is going to be my go-to for winter. 10/10 recommend! üß°

testimonials.text: Girlll I just got mine and I'm in love!! The softness is unreal - I keep rubbing it on my face lol üòÇ It's true to size, the red is gorgeous, and it arrived in like 5 days which was way faster than I expected. I was worried it would be too thin but it's actually a really nice weight. Perfect for layering or wearing alone. So happy with this purchase! You need to get one if you haven't already üíï‚ú®

testimonials.name: Madison Scott
testimonials.text: Just wanted to drop you a note because this sweater is EVERYTHING. I've been living in it since it arrived last week. The cashmere is so soft and luxurious, and the red color is perfect - not too bright, not too dark. I wore it to work today with black trousers and got compliments from like 5 people. My coworker asked if it was from Everlane or Reformation and was shocked when I told her the price. This is such a good find! Thank you for posting about it! üôè

testimonials.name: Scarlett Hayes
testimonials.text: I'm usually really picky about knitwear because I hate anything scratchy or rough, but this is PERFECT. It's so soft I could sleep in it (and honestly I might lol). The fit is really flattering - not boxy but not too fitted either. And the red is beautiful, such a classic shade. I'm impressed by the quality, especially for the price. Shipping was fast too, came in this cute tissue paper. Very happy customer! üíñ

testimonials.name: Victoria Reed
testimonials.text: Okay I need to share this... I bought this sweater skeptical AF because how can real cashmere be this affordable?? But it's LEGIT. The Good Cashmere Standard certification is real (I looked it up), and you can FEEL the quality. It's buttery soft, warm without being too hot, and the red is so rich and beautiful. I've worn it 3 times already this week. Best online purchase I've made in months, hands down. If you're on the fence, just get it! üî•

This is my new favorite sweater and I'm buying it in every color they release üõçÔ∏è

testimonials.text: This sweater is proof that you don't need to spend hundreds to look expensive. The cashmere is buttery soft, drapes beautifully, and that red is STUNNING in person. Fits true to size, washes well, feels incredible against skin. Found my new winter staple. üß£

testimonials.text: Was NOT expecting this quality for the price. Real talk: this cashmere rivals my designer pieces. The red is perfection, the fit is chef's kiss, and I'm obsessed. Already ordered a second one as a gift. Do yourself a favor and buy this. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•

testimonials.name: Audrey Palmer
testimonials.text: PSA: If you've been wanting real cashmere but can't drop $200+, THIS IS IT. Certified, soft as clouds, that red color is *everything*. Arrived in 4 days. Zero complaints. 11/10 would recommend. üéØ

testimonials.name: Rachel Montgomery
testimonials.text:
I purchased the Red Cashmere Sweater during the pre-order promotion and I am genuinely impressed with the quality. As someone who owns several high-end cashmere pieces, I was skeptical about the price point, but this sweater exceeded my expectations in every way.

The cashmere is 100% pure and certified by the Good Cashmere Standard, which was important to me. The fabric is incredibly soft - no pilling after multiple wears and washes (I hand wash in cold water with cashmere shampoo). The red color is a beautiful, rich shade that photographs well and works for both casual and dressy occasions.

Fit-wise, it's true to size with a classic crew neck design. The ribbed trims on the cuffs and hem are well-constructed and maintain their shape. It's not too thick or too thin - perfect weight for layering or wearing alone in mild weather.

Shipping was prompt (received in 6 days internationally) and the packaging was professional. The company also offers 30-day returns which gave me confidence in ordering.

My only minor critique is that I wish it came in more colors, but I'm so happy with the red that I'd consider purchasing another if they expand the range. For the quality and price, this is an exceptional value. Highly recommend for anyone looking for genuine cashmere without the luxury markup.

testimonials.name: Emily Richardson
testimonials.text:
Excellent quality cashmere sweater at an unbeatable price point. I've been buying cashmere for years and was curious if this could compete with department store brands - it absolutely does. The fiber quality is genuine, the construction is solid with no loose threads or irregular stitching, and the color is exactly as pictured.

The sweater has a timeless, versatile design that works well for multiple settings. I've worn it to the office with dress pants, casually with jeans on weekends, and even to a dinner event with a skirt. The red color is sophisticated and festive without being overwhelming.

After three washes (following care instructions), the sweater has maintained its shape and softness perfectly. No shrinkage, no color fading, no pilling. The ribbed detailing is reinforced well and the overall durability is impressive.

Customer service was responsive when I had a question about sizing before ordering. Delivery was as promised. The 30-day return policy is generous and shows the company stands behind their product.

For anyone considering this: if you want authentic cashmere quality without paying luxury brand prices, this is it. I'm a repeat customer now and would rate this 5 stars without hesitation.

testimonials.name: Claire Bennett
testimonials.text:
Fantastic value for genuine cashmere. I ordered this somewhat impulsively during a sale and was pleasantly surprised by the quality when it arrived. The cashmere is soft, warm, and feels luxurious against the skin - no itchiness or roughness whatsoever.

The red shade is beautiful and versatile. It's a deep, rich red that complements many skin tones and pairs easily with neutrals. The classic crew neck design is flattering and the fit is consistent with standard sizing (I'm 5'6", 140 lbs and the medium fits perfectly).

I appreciate that the company is transparent about their Good Cashmere Standard certification and ethical sourcing. As a conscious consumer, this matters to me and adds value beyond just the physical product.

The sweater arrived well-packaged and in perfect condition. Shipping time was reasonable (about a week to California). The care instructions are clear and easy to follow.

I've worn this sweater multiple times over the past two weeks and have received numerous compliments. It elevates any outfit and feels special without being overly delicate. I'm impressed enough that I'm considering purchasing another color when available. Highly recommended for anyone seeking quality cashmere at an accessible price.

testimonials.name: Jessica Turner
testimonials.text: I wasn't planning to write a review but I'm so impressed with this sweater that I had to share! I bought it as a treat for myself after a tough year, and honestly, it's brought me so much joy. The cashmere is incredibly soft - my daughter keeps asking to wear it lol. The red is absolutely gorgeous, and I've gotten compliments every single time I've worn it. I wore it to our family Christmas photos and it looked beautiful. The quality is outstanding, especially for the price. I've already recommended it to my sister and my best friend. This is one of those rare purchases where you feel like you got way more than what you paid for. If you're thinking about getting it, just do it! You won't regret it. ‚ù§Ô∏è

testimonials.name: Lauren Phillips
testimonials.text: Ladies, I need to tell you about this sweater because it's AMAZING! I ordered it three weeks ago and I've literally worn it at least 10 times already. My husband even commented on how nice I looked in it (which never happens lol üòÇ). The cashmere is real deal soft and luxurious - I compared it to a sweater I bought at Bloomingdales for $180 and honestly can't tell much difference. The red color is so pretty and festive, perfect for the holidays but also works year-round. I wore it to my book club last week and three of the ladies asked where I got it and immediately ordered one when I told them the price. It's also held up really well - I've washed it twice (gentle cycle, lay flat to dry) and it still looks brand new. The fit is very flattering, not boxy at all. If you've been wanting a nice cashmere sweater but didn't want to spend a fortune, this is IT. I'm seriously considering buying another one in a different color if they release more options. Best online purchase I've made in a long time! üíï
